mapper.insert: insert into sys_logininfo (usertype, usercode, password, salt, isexp, userinfo,username) values (#{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usercode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isexp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userinfo,jdbcType=BIGINT}), #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_logininfo set usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isexp = #{isexp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userinfo = #{userinfo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, usertype, usercode, password, salt, locked,userinfo from sys_logininfo
